name: OR_LNLG_POST_SKCMT
description: This table holds the value of the  Post-op skin comments (I ORM 890) item. It  is used to hold additional comments about the patient's post-op skin condition.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.
